org.eclipselabs.emongo

Interface MongoDatabaseProvider


  • public interface MongoDatabaseProvider
    A MongoDatabaseProvider allows clients to obtain a reference to a MongoDB database without having to understand the configuration of the database. Instances of MongoDatabaseProvider will be registered as an OSGi service. This service allows the database connection to be configured independent of the client code. It is expected that the client code will be aware of the alias to distinguish between multiple databases.
    Author:
    bhunt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PROP_ALIAS
      The service property key for configuring the database alias.

    • Field Detail

      • PROP_ALIAS

        static final java.lang.String PROP_ALIAS
        The service property key for configuring the database alias. The alias value may be used by client code to distinguish between multiple databases.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getAlias

        java.lang.String getAlias()
        Returns:
        the value of the configured alias

      • getURI

        java.lang.String getURI()
        Returns:
        the database URI in the form: mongodb://host[:port]/database

      • getDB

        com.mongodb.DB getDB()
        Returns:
        the MongoDB database
